RT @nypost: Soccer icon Pelé dead at 82 after health battles https://t.co/ODovnIWLOM https://t.co/0rlibXOVY5

A crypto regulation bill needs the following provision: 

100% margin requirement for any crypto-related transaction on any crypto exchange, period, end of discussion. 

If you want to buy fake money, fine, but you have to supply the real money, rather than someone else.

FTX is what you get when you mix the riskiest parts of shadow banking with the riskiest parts of crypto.

If something doesn't have a future cash flow stream that can operate independently of speculative activity, it should not be accepted as collateral & should not be leveraged.
